Single SNP QTL MR evidence

xqtl_single_snp_mr.Rd

Single SNP QTL MR evidence

xqtl_single_snp_mr(exposure_gene = NULL, outcome_trait = NULL,
  snp = NULL, qtl_type = c("eQTL", "pQTL"), pval_threshold = 1e-05,
  mode = c("table", "raw"))

Arguments

exposure_gene

Name of the exposure gene
outcome_trait

Name of the outcome trait
snp

SNP rsid
qtl_type

"eQTL" or "pQTL"
pval_threshold

P-value threshold
mode

If mode = "table", returns a data frame (a tibble as per tidyverse convention). If mode = "raw", returns a raw response from EpiGraphDB API with minimal parsing done by httr.

Value

Data from /xqtl/single-snp-mr

Examples

xqtl_single_snp_mr(outcome_trait = "Coronary heart disease")
#> # A tibble: 404 x 8
#>    exposure_ensemb… exposure_name outcome_id outcome_name      b     se        p
#>    <chr>            <chr>         <chr>      <chr>         <dbl>  <dbl>    <dbl>
